pages.text: The prominent mystery that pervades this field of study is the question of Purpeille: why, if $(item)Preserved Dust$() is created through age, does Purpeille present itself as a purposeful invention?$(br2)Regardless, this metal unlocks a multitude of secrets within this world and it is foolish to preoccupy oneself with its existence.
Given that dust of this calibre was probably not meant to undergo this process, expect smelting it to take quite awhile. Use a $(item)Blast Furnace$() for the quickest results.

Purpeille, like other metals, can be used to create an assortment of tools, armor, and weapons. Our experiments have demonstrated that it is slightly stronger and more resistant than Netherite.$(br2)A keen follower would recognize that obtaining Purpeille requires significant effort for little benefit over the alternative. We implore you to be patient, as this material has more to offer yet.
Unlike most footwear, Purpeille provides the most durable sandals. Conventional boot designs were either too heavy or brittle. This shaves two ingots off the crafting recipe.

If you have acquired a sufficient quantity of Purpeille, not to mention $(item)Remnant Bricks$(), then you are ready to begin your journey into the beyond.$(br2)You must adjust to your newfound power as one of the few followers of the Ancients. From here, your story can only grow more encaptivating.
